title: LitLitBit
author: LitLitBit
content: ….where to even begin….so I have these Pokémon Basorexia forum user cards and I’m looking to auction them. If I’m not mistaken Basorexia scammed the project years before Yogg followed in his footsteps. Prior to listing these for auction I figured I’d offer them up to the users whose the cards are based on to give them right of first refusal. If you want nothing to do with coldkey and these cards TRUST ME i completely understand but I thought it best to offer to those users first before I auction them. If you’re interested please shoot me a pm. Happy to provide more pics of a specific card front/back etc just ask. These are buyer funded cards and have not been funded or peeled. All holograms are fully intact. There are 21 in the collection.Users in the collection: Basorexia, Mitchell, Minerjones, Fattcatt, Hox, Owlcatz, Bitcoinpenny, Rxalts, Theymos, Krogoth, Digicoinuser, Tweetious, Teegumes, Lesbiancow, Agrawas, Dobzombie, Chibitcty, Chronicsky, Jcga, Anonminer and the scumbag himself Yogg. All cards are #2 except for Anonminer is #16. If I don’t hear back plan is to start the auction this weekend. The scumbag himself

comments.author: YodasRedRocket
comments.body: Cool of you to offer them to their namesakes fist.Ironically, I'd bid on the crackhead Yogg's card when it goes to auction.

comments.author: Lesbian Cow
comments.body: That is a really cool full set of the double skam cards!   Thanks for the offer, but I have one of my namesake so all good. Should you end up auctioning them as a complete set, I am most likely a bidder.

comments.author: xSlyy
comments.created_time: April 06, 2023, 11:58:09 PMLast edit: April 07, 2023, 05:19:28 PM by xSlyy
comments.body: I unashamedly would bid on mjs card

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: At least you got your set - he told me mine was ready to ship but it never did.

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on April 07, 2023, 02:02:38 AMAt least you got your set - he told me mine was ready to ship but it never did.If I had my way, I'd like to see you get reimbursed through the charity auctions for that, it was complete bs - He lied to me personally so many times about them, I'm so sorry...  I just want the fuckhead behind bars..  It was what, like $750?

I just want the fuckhead behind bars..  It was what, like $750? 640 euros for the full set

See if this link works.   Thanks for posting!  Perhaps the image sizes are too big...let me try and adjust!       Thanks for your help! I don’t know what I’m doing when it comes to these forum posts  You need to shrink the image size...thats all...if they are too big it will not work.   I use paintbrush and then reduce image....it works all the time...cheers!

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.created_time: April 14, 2023, 05:56:08 PMLast edit: April 14, 2023, 10:23:00 PM by ChiBitCTy
comments.body: Woah, so that ChiBitCTy card was made for me specifically by Yogg for free. How’d you come across these? I certainly would like to obtain mine. It would have been nice if you reached out to everyone via PM in case they didn’t see this thread. Aren’t these cards property of those Yogg made them ? Regardless I’d like to get my card..Edit- I was explained the story behind these. I thought that you had somehow obtained all the originals from Yogg directly.  I see now he made sets. Anyhow, would love to buy mine if possible, of course Yogg never sent me mine. Thx 🙏
